pacman.algorithms

Class AbstractAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • pacman.algorithms.AbstractAlgorithm
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DfsAlgorithm, GreedyAlgorithm, NullAlgorithm, RandomSelectionAlgorithm

    public abstract class AbstractAlgorithm
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains the algorithm of pacman and ghost in the maze. The search is mainly BFS and A star.
    Version:
    1.0
